text: Banner patterns have been split from textures-atlas into their own dedicated atlas, banner_patterns.png-atlas.

texts.text: This article is about the history of the banner_patterns.png-atlas file. For a comprehensive history of block texture changes, see Java Edition history of textures.
banner_patterns.png-atlas is a procedurally-generated texture atlas used to store textures for all banner patterns.
banner_patterns.png-atlas is a fixed-width 512 × 512-pixel file that store textures for all banner patterns.
Textures of banner patterns in item form and banner itself is stored in blocks.png-atlas.
